page.title: 05Shuttleworth College
page.content: Shuttleworth College was opened as an agricultural college in 1946. The Shuttleworth Trust was established in 1944 for educational purposes.The trustees are responsible for the agricultural college and the Shuttleworth Collection. At present there are 250 students,180 attend full_time residential courses , the rest gain practical experience working on farms. There are 360 hectares of land used for agriculture and the college offers a variety of courses. The large college building was rebuilt in 1876.The ground floor comprises of 7 rooms including a small chapel with a crystal chandelier and a painted ceiling which was originally patterned with gold leaf.The large art collection includes 87 paintings on the ground floor alone.
